alert.note: Alert for Coweta; Heard; Meriwether; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 1:50PM EDT until July 21 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Meriwether County in west central Georgia... Southeastern Heard County in west central Georgia... Northeastern Troup County in west central Georgia... Southwestern Coweta County in west central Georgia... * Until 230 PM EDT. * At 150 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Corinth, or 8 miles southeast of Franklin, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... LaGrange, Franklin, Hogansville, Grantville, Luthersville, Lone Oak, Corinth, Saint Marks, Harrisonville, Hillcrest and Louise. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
